entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support Content Negotiation in EndpointMetadataApiDescriptionProvider #60590
  • Add API to support dyanmically generated OpenAPI schemas in document #60589
    10.0-preview3
  • Multiple X-Forwarded-Prefix header segments are not handled correctly in ForwarededHeadersMiddleware #60587
  • Microsoft Identity is not blocking users not yet confirmed #60586
  • Support async generator based streaming API in javascript #60585
  • Benchmark stopped running: blazorWebInteractiveAuto, blazorWebInteractiveServer, blazorWebInteractiveWebAssembly #60583
  • Perf improvement: single_query #60582

Closed

  • Perf regression: updates #60562
  • Perf regression: json, json #60568
  • When I install Microsoft.Extensions.ApiDescription.Server package, I encountered a System.TimeoutException #60271

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix overload resolution issue for Delegate and RequestDelegate #60593
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Always call virtual UpdatePasswordHash #60252 #60592
    area-identity, community-contribution

Merged

  • Add module initializer for Verify.SourceGenerators #60547
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview3
  • Fix: Mark catch-all route parameters as optional (#60392) #60544
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 10.0-preview3
  • Enable arm64 DEBs #60565
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview3

Updated

  • Add support for AddOpenApiOperationTransformer API #60566
    feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Setting the Description in a ProducesResponseTypeAttribute works correctly for Minimal API #60539
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Scroll in enhanced navigation behaves same as in client side routing #60296
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-enhanced-navigation
  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-preview.3.25122.1 #60564
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • using one style approach for all 3 configs WebAssembly, Web and Server #56758
    area-blazor, stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun
